entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
